name: Sweet Devil
description:
Play as Cutlery Knight Sylva Ware! Go up against Princess Dead Velvet Cake and her subordinates and stop them from taking over the land.

Sweet Devil is an exciting combination of gacha-gameplay and platforming mechanics! Summon new devils every day and collect every demoness in the gallery!

FEATURES:

Sweet Devil uses gacha-gameplay mechanics in a new way! Summon levels to play and collect all of the devils!

Hone your platforming skills by taking on the various demoness!

Improve your combat capabilities by leveling up your stats!          

Enjoy up to 5 levels of demon fighting action!
